full_summary:
===============

**Tender Announcement: Chair for Federal Heritage Conference Room**

**Reference Number:** PW-22-01016294
**Solicitation Number:** 23-233779

**Announcement Details:**
-----------------------------

*   **Title:** Chair for Federal Heritage Conference Room
*   **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)
*   **Trade Agreements:** Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), and Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   **Contracting Entity:** Foreign Affairs, Trade And Development (Department Of)
*   **End-User Entity:** Foreign Affairs, Trade And Development (Department Of)
*   **Contact Information:**
    *   **Name:** Dai, Shenny
    *   **Email:** shenny.dai@international.gc.ca
    *   **Phone:** 613-791-6782

**Tender Description:**
-------------------------

This Request for Proposal (RFP) for the Chair for Federal Heritage Conference Room is subject to Amendment 002, which extends the closing date for submissions until January 6, 2023, and modifies the deadline for delivery to March 17, 2023. Amendment 001, which addresses questions and answers, is also attached.

The required product is a Rotary Chair, and the procurement falls under the following Product Category(ies) of the Supply Arrangement (SA) # E60PQ-120001/G.

**Important Documents:**
-------------------------

The following attachments are available for download:

*   https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/19/567d9a3cc74d8566e5dbcf9825f6c047/amendment_-rfb_23-233779_chair_for_federal_heritage_conference_room.pdf
*   https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/07/8a8c8a52ec60db95c2a1c4c1fab1ed43/npp_e_23-233779.pdf
